contact.responseTime: Initiating communication sequence with control center. Response time: 24-hour orbital window.

contact.enterpriseDesc: Deep space missions, custom payload configurations, or white-label mission management? Our enterprise fleet is standing by.

about.description1: NABD represents the pinnacle of excellence in AI consulting.
about.description2: Mission: A crew of exceptional elite consultants from control to strategic consulting.
about.description3: Where visionaries reach the space of AI expertise.
about.objectiveDesc1: The NABD team represents trusted advisors to visionaries seeking transformative AI solutions. We are the silent force behind complex strategies that deliver exceptional results.
about.objectiveDesc2: Our specialists deliver AI strategy, advanced analytics, and solutions tailored to individual mission parameters. Every mission executed with the highest precision.
about.objectiveDesc3: This is not a marketplace. This is an exclusive control center for the most prominent AI consultants in space, dedicated only to those who demand nothing less than orbital excellence.
about.parametersDesc: Every NABD mission is defined by parameters of excellence
about.speedDesc: Maximum acceleration in development cycles. Elite specialists delivering transformative results at unparalleled orbital velocity.
about.securityDesc: Military-grade encryption protocols. All mission-critical data remains under your control only.
about.precisionDesc: Calculated trajectory corrections. Every mission executed with surgical precision to the finest specifications.
about.legacyDesc: Generational impact. We create solutions that build lasting competitive advantage across orbital cycles.
about.crewSpecDesc: Strategic consulting in topics that define competitive advantage
about.accessDesc: Access to NABD is by invitation only. Submit your request, and our control team will assess your compatibility for access to the most prominent AI specialists.
about.crewRosterDesc: Core crew positions within NABD mission command
about.ctaDesc: Access to NABD is by invitation only. Submit your request, and our control team will assess your compatibility for access to the most prominent AI specialists.

request.description: Choose a template or describe your project. Our AI matches you with the perfect experts.
request.placeholder: Describe your project in detail. The more specific, the better the match...

mvp.title: MVP Launch
mvp.description: Build and ship a working MVP with core features in 2-4 weeks
mvp.prompt:
I need to build an MVP for my startup. The core features are:

- User authentication
- Main product functionality
- Basic dashboard

Timeline: 2-4 weeks to launch

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Add AI/ML capabilities to your existing product
aiIntegration.prompt:
I want to integrate AI into my existing application:

- Current stack: [describe your tech]
- AI use case: [chatbot/recommendations/analysis]
- Data available: [describe your data]

Goal: Enhance user experience with intelligent features

growth.title: Growth Analytics
growth.description: Set up analytics and optimize conversion funnels
growth.prompt:
Need help with growth and analytics:

- Current metrics: [describe KPIs]
- Biggest challenge: [conversion/retention/acquisition]
- Tools in use: [list current tools]

Goal: Data-driven growth strategy

chatbot.title: Support Bot
chatbot.description: Build an AI chatbot to handle customer support
chatbot.prompt:
Need a customer support chatbot:

- Platform: [web/app/both]
- Common questions: [list top 5 FAQs]
- Escalation needed: [when to involve humans]

Goal: Reduce support tickets by 50%+

automation.title: Workflow Automation
automation.prompt:
Looking to automate workflows:

- Current manual process: [describe steps]
- Frequency: [how often this runs]
- Tools involved: [list integrations needed]

Goal: Save hours per week on repetitive tasks

pitch.title: Pitch Optimization
pitch.description: AI analysis of your pitch deck for fundraising
pitch.prompt:
Need help optimizing my pitch deck:

- Stage: [pre-seed/seed/series A]
- Industry: [your market]
- Current deck: [number of slides]

Goal: Improve investor conversion rate

premium.title: Premium Support

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How does the credit system work?
faq.a1: Credits are your currency for accessing Nabd services. Each service has a transparent credit cost based on complexity and specialist expertise. You'll always know the exact cost before committing.
faq.a2: Excellence is our standard. If a deliverable doesn't meet your expectations, we'll work with you to make it right or refund your credits. No questions asked.
faq.q3: Can I transfer credits to another account?
faq.a3: Credits are non-transferable and tied to your individual account. For custom arrangements, contact our partnerships team.
faq.q4: How quickly can I access a specialist?
faq.a4: Executive and Pinnacle members receive priority matching within 24-48 hours. Foundation members typically connect within 72 hours.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using NABD AI consulting services.

intro.title: 1. Introduction and Acceptance
intro.p1: These Terms of Service govern your use of NABD's AI consulting platform and services, operated by NewCo Ltd. ("we," "our," or "us"), registered at New Address 1, Company No: NEW123.
intro.p2: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you may not use our services.
intro.p3: We reserve the right to modify these terms with reasonable notice. Material changes will be notified to you at least 30 days in advance. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.p1: NABD provides a premium AI consulting platform connecting individual clients with elite AI specialists. Our services include:
services.item1: Access to verified AI consultants and specialists
services.item2: Credit-based payment system for consulting services
services.item3: Bespoke AI solutions and strategic advisory
services.item4: Platform tools for service delivery and communication

withdrawal.title: 3.1 Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.p1: As a consumer in the European Union, you have the right to withdraw from credit purchases within 14 days of purchase without giving any reason. To exercise this right, contact us at support@nabd.ai with your order details.
withdrawal.p2: Please note: If you request consulting services to begin during the withdrawal period and the service is fully performed, you may not be entitled to withdraw or may be required to pay proportionate costs for services rendered.

guarantees.title: 3.2 Consumer Guarantees
guarantees.p1: Services must be performed with reasonable care and skill. If services are defective or not as described, you may be entitled to a remedy including service correction, price reduction, or refund in accordance with EU consumer protection laws.

purchases.title: 4.1 Credit Purchases
purchases.p1: Credits are purchased directly as one-time transactions. NABD does not operate on a subscription model. Each credit purchase is a separate contract for digital content.
purchases.p2: Exchange rate: 10 credits = 1 USD (or equivalent in EUR). Prices are displayed in your local currency at checkout.

terms.title: 4.2 Credit Terms
terms.item3: Unused credits may be refunded within 30 days of purchase (subject to withdrawal rights)
terms.item4: Credits are debited only when services are successfully completed

obligations.title: 5. User Obligations
obligations.item3: Use services only for lawful purposes
obligations.item4: Not attempt to circumvent platform security
obligations.item6: Comply with all applicable EU and local laws

payment.title: 6. Payment Terms
payment.p1: All payments are processed securely through authorized payment providers. We accept Visa and Mastercard.
payment.p2: Prices include applicable VAT where required. VAT will be shown separately at checkout for EU customers.
payment.p3: You will receive a tax-compliant invoice for each purchase via email.

refund.title: 7. Refund Policy
refund.p1: See our dedicated Refund Policy for complete details.
refund.p2: In summary: Unused credits may be refunded within 30 days. Credits used for completed services are generally non-refundable, though we maintain a satisfaction guarantee and will work to resolve any issues.

ip.title: 8. Intellectual Property
ip.p1: All platform content, trademarks, and intellectual property remain the property of NewCo Ltd. or our licensors.
ip.p2: Deliverables from consulting engagements: Ownership and licensing terms will be specified in individual engagement agreements between you and the specialist.

liability.title: 9. Liability
liability.p1: Nothing in these Terms excludes or limits our liability for:
liability.item1: Death or personal injury caused by negligence
liability.item3: Any liability that cannot be excluded under EU law
liability.p2: Subject to the above, our liability for any claim is limited to the total amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim. We are not liable for indirect or consequential losses that are not reasonably foreseeable.

data.title: 10. Data Protection
data.p1: Your personal data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws including GDPR. You have rights regarding your personal data as detailed in our Privacy Policy.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.p1: You may close your account at any time. We may suspend or terminate accounts for violations of these Terms, with notice where reasonably possible.
termination.p2: Upon termination, unused credits may be refunded in accordance with our refund policy. Completed services and their terms survive termination.

disputes.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
disputes.p1: These Terms are governed by the laws of the European Union and applicable member state law.
disputes.p2: In the event of a dispute, we encourage you to contact us first at legal@nabd.ai to seek an amicable resolution.
disputes.p3: If you are a consumer in the EU, you retain the right to bring proceedings in the courts of your country of residence. You may also use the EU Online Dispute Resolution platform.
disputes.p4: Nothing in these Terms affects your statutory rights as a consumer.

contact.title: 13. Contact Information
contact.p1: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how NABD collects, uses, and protects your personal information in accordance with GDPR.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: NewCo Ltd. ("we," "our," or "us"), Company No: NEW123, registered at New Address 1, is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable data protection laws.
intro.p2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when you use the NABD platform and services.
intro.p3: We are the data controller for the personal data we process. Our Data Protection Officer can be contacted at dpo@nabd.ai.

provided.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
provided.item1: Account information: name, email address, password (encrypted)
provided.item2: Payment information: billing address, payment card details (processed by our payment provider)
provided.item4: Communications: messages sent through our platform, support inquiries

automatic.title: 2.2 Information Collected Automatically
automatic.item1: Technical data: IP address, browser type and version, device information
automatic.item2: Usage data: pages visited, time spent, interaction patterns
automatic.item3: Cookies and tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy)

thirdParty.title: 2.3 Information from Third Parties
thirdParty.p1: We may receive data from payment processors, analytics providers, and security services necessary to operate our platform.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Bases and Purposes for Processing
legalBasis.p1: We process your personal data only when we have a lawful basis:

contractual.title: 3.1 Contractual Necessity
contractual.p1: To provide our services, process transactions, and fulfill our contractual obligations to you.

legal.title: 3.3 Legal Obligations
legal.p1: To comply with legal requirements including tax, accounting, and anti-money laundering obligations.

consent.title: 3.4 Consent
consent.p1: For marketing communications and non-essential cookies. You may withdraw consent at any time.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.p1: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only as follows:

providers.title: 4.1 Service Providers
providers.p1: We engage trusted third-party processors for:
providers.p2: All processors are bound by data processing agreements ensuring GDPR compliance.

specialists.title: 4.2 Specialists
specialists.p1: When you engage a specialist, relevant project information is shared to facilitate service delivery.

legal.title: 4.3 Legal Requirements
legal.p1: We may disclose data when required by law, to protect our rights, or in response to valid legal requests from authorities.

transfers.title: 5. International Data Transfers
transfers.p1: Your data is primarily stored within the European Economic Area (EEA). Where we transfer data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
transfers.item1: Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission
transfers.item2: Adequacy decisions by the European Commission

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.p1: We retain personal data only as long as necessary:
retention.item1: Account data: While your account is active and up to 7 years after closure for legal obligations
retention.item2: Transaction records: 7 years for tax and accounting purposes
retention.item3: Marketing data: Until you withdraw consent or 2 years of inactivity

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
security.item1: Encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest
security.p2: In the event of a data breach affecting your rights, we will notify you and the relevant supervisory authority within 72 hours as required by GDPR.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.p1: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: 8.1 Right of Access
access.p1: Request a copy of your personal data we hold.

rectification.title: 8.2 Right to Rectification
rectification.p1: Correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: 8.3 Right to Erasure
erasure.p1: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal retention requirements).

restriction.title: 8.4 Right to Restriction
restriction.p1: Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances.

portability.title: 8.5 Right to Data Portability
portability.p1: Receive your data in a structured, commonly used format and transmit it to another controller.

object.title: 8.6 Right to Object
object.p1: Object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing.

withdraw.title: 8.7 Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.p1: Withdraw consent for processing based on consent (does not affect prior lawful processing).

rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@nabd.ai. We will respond within one month. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection supervisory authority.

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar technologies. For detailed information, see our Cookie Policy. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent tool.

marketing.title: 10. Marketing Communications
marketing.p1: We send marketing communications only with your consent. You may unsubscribe at any time using the link in our emails or by contacting privacy@nabd.ai. We will process your opt-out within 48 hours.

children.title: 11. Children's Privacy
children.p1: Our services are not intended for individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe we have collected data from a child, please contact us immediately at privacy@nabd.ai.

automated.title: 12. Automated Decision-Making
automated.p1: We may use automated systems to match clients with specialists. You have the right to request human review of automated decisions that significantly affect you.

changes.title: 13. Policy Changes
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Material changes will be notified to you by email or prominent notice on our platform at least 30 days in advance. The "Last updated" date will be revised accordingly.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.p1: For questions, concerns, or to exercise your rights, please contact:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies on the NABD platform.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: This Cookie Policy explains how NewCo Ltd. ("we," "our," or "us") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on the NABD platform.
intro.p2: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy. You can manage your cookie preferences as described below.

whatAreCookies.title: 2. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember information about your visit, such as your preferences and actions.
whatAreCookies.p2: Similar technologies include web beacons, pixels, and local storage, which serve comparable purposes.

necessary.title: 3.1 Strictly Necessary Cookies
necessary.p1: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

functional.title: 3.2 Functional Cookies
functional.p1: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences.

analytics.title: 3.3 Performance/Analytics Cookies
analytics.p1: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: 3.4 Marketing/Targeting Cookies
marketing.p1: These cookies track your browsing habits to deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness.

session.title: 4.1 Session Cookies
session.p1: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser. Used for session management and security.

persistent.title: 4.2 Persistent Cookies
persistent.p1: Remain on your device for a set period (up to 12 months) or until manually deleted. Used to remember your preferences across sessions.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.p1: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies. These providers have their own privacy policies:

consent.title: 6.1 Cookie Consent Tool
consent.p1: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner. You can accept all cookies, reject non-essential cookies, or customize your preferences.
consent.p2: You can change your preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings in your account or using the cookie preferences link in the footer.

browser.title: 6.2 Browser Settings
browser.p1: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
browser.item3: Delete cookies after each browsing session
browser.p2: Please note that blocking all cookies may impact your ability to use certain features of our website.

instructions.title: 6.3 Browser-Specific Instructions
instructions.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
instructions.firefox: Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
instructions.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
instructions.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

dnt.title: 7. Do Not Track Signals
dnt.p1: Some browsers support "Do Not Track" (DNT) signals. Currently, there is no universal standard for handling DNT signals. We respect your privacy choices made through our cookie consent tool and browser settings.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights
rights.p1: Under GDPR, you have rights regarding cookies and tracking:
rights.item1: Right to be informed about cookies we use
rights.item2: Right to consent or refuse non-essential cookies
rights.item3: Right to withdraw consent at any time
rights.item4: Right to object to processing for legitimate interests

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. The "Last updated" date will be revised accordingly. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.description: Information about refunds and our satisfaction guarantee.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.p1: At NABD, operated by NewCo Ltd., we are committed to your satisfaction. This Refund Policy outlines your rights to refunds and withdrawals in compliance with EU consumer protection laws.
overview.p2: All refunds are subject to the terms outlined below and your statutory rights under EU law.

euRights.title: 2. EU Right of Withdrawal (14-Day Cooling-Off Period)

yourRights.title: 2.1 Your Rights
yourRights.p1: As a consumer in the European Union, you have the right to withdraw from credit purchases within 14 days of purchase without providing a reason, in accordance with the EU Consumer Rights Directive.

howTo.title: 2.2 How to Exercise Your Right
howTo.p1: To withdraw from a purchase, send a clear written statement to:
howTo.subject: Subject line: "Withdrawal Request"
howTo.include: Include: Your name, order number, and date of purchase
howTo.p3: The 14-day period begins on the day of purchase. You must communicate your decision to withdraw before the deadline.

exception.title: 2.3 Important Exception - Services Commenced Early
exception.p1: If you request consulting services to begin during the 14-day withdrawal period and the service is fully performed, you lose your right to withdraw. However, you will only pay proportionate costs for services actually rendered before withdrawal.

unused.title: 3.1 Unused Credits
unused.p1: Unused credits may be refunded within 30 days of purchase. After 30 days, credits remain valid indefinitely but are non-refundable.
unused.p2: To request a refund of unused credits, contact support@nabd.ai with:

partial.title: 3.2 Partially Used Credit Packages
partial.p1: If you have used some credits from a package:
partial.item1: Within 14 days: You may withdraw and receive a refund for unused credits (minus the standard rate for credits used)
partial.item2: After 14 days but within 30 days: Refund available for unused credits at the package rate
partial.item3: After 30 days: No refund available, but credits remain valid

bonus.title: 3.3 Bonus Credits
bonus.p1: Bonus credits received as part of promotional packages are non-refundable but remain valid indefinitely.

completed.title: 4.1 Completed Services
completed.p1: Credits used for successfully completed consulting services are generally non-refundable. However, we maintain a satisfaction guarantee (see Section 5).

cancelled.title: 4.2 Cancelled or Incomplete Services
cancelled.p1: If a service is cancelled before completion or a specialist fails to deliver:
cancelled.item1: Full credit refund to your account balance
cancelled.item2: Option to cash refund within 14 days of cancellation

defects.title: 4.3 Service Defects
defects.p1: If services are defective, not as described, or fail to meet reasonable quality standards, you are entitled to remedies under EU consumer law, including service correction, price reduction, or refund.

satisfaction.title: 5. Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfaction.p1: We stand behind the quality of our specialist services. If you are not satisfied with a completed service:
satisfaction.item1: Contact us within 7 days of service completion
satisfaction.item2: Provide specific details about your concerns
satisfaction.item3: We will review and offer remedies, which may include:
satisfaction.subItem1: Service revision by the same specialist
satisfaction.p2: Our goal is to ensure every engagement meets your expectations and our standards of excellence.

time.title: 6.1 Processing Time
time.p1: We process refund requests within 5 business days of approval. Refunds are issued to your original payment method.

payment.title: 6.2 Payment Method Timing
payment.item1: Credit/Debit cards: 5-10 business days (depending on your bank)
payment.item2: Other payment methods: As specified by the payment provider

currency.title: 6.3 Currency and Fees
currency.p1: Refunds are issued in the original purchase currency. We do not charge refund processing fees. However, your bank or payment provider may apply currency conversion or transaction fees beyond our control.

nonRefundable.title: 7. Non-Refundable Items
nonRefundable.item2: Credits older than 30 days (unless subject to satisfaction guarantee)
nonRefundable.item4: Services fully performed during the withdrawal period with your express consent

fraudulent.title: 8. Fraudulent or Abusive Refund Requests
fraudulent.p1: We reserve the right to refuse refunds for fraudulent or abusive requests, including repeated refund requests without valid reason. Such actions may result in account suspension or termination.

disputes.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputes.p1: If you are not satisfied with our refund decision, you may:
disputes.item1: Contact our customer support team for escalation
disputes.item2: Use the EU Online Dispute Resolution platform
disputes.item3: Contact your local consumer protection authority
disputes.item4: Seek legal remedies under applicable law

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Refund Policy from time to time. Material changes will be notified by email or prominent notice on our platform. Your statutory rights as a consumer are not affected by policy changes.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.p1: For refund requests or questions about this policy:

license.title: License Agreement
license.description: Terms governing the licensing of content and services.

grant.title: 1. Grant of License
grant.p1: Upon purchase of a photo from NABD, the Licensor (photographer) grants you (the Licensee) a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual license to use the photo according to the terms of the license type selected at purchase.
grant.p2: This license is non-transferable and may not be sublicensed to third parties. The photographer retains full copyright ownership of the image.

standardLicense.title: 2. Standard License
standardLicense.item1: Use in websites, apps, and digital media
standardLicense.item3: Print materials with distribution up to 500,000 copies
standardLicense.p2: Standard licenses are valid for a single user/seat. Organizations requiring multiple users should purchase additional licenses or upgrade to Extended.

extendedLicense.title: 3. Extended License
extendedLicense.p1: The Extended License includes all Standard License rights plus:
extendedLicense.item2: Products intended for resale (merchandise, prints, etc.)
extendedLicense.item4: Multi-seat license for teams up to 10 users

restrictions.title: 4. Restrictions
restrictions.p1: Regardless of license type, you may NOT:
restrictions.item1: Resell, redistribute, or share the original image file
restrictions.item2: Use the image in a way that suggests endorsement by persons depicted
restrictions.item3: Use in pornographic, defamatory, or illegal content
restrictions.item4: Remove or alter watermarks or embedded metadata
restrictions.item5: Use to train AI/ML models without explicit written permission
restrictions.item6: Falsely claim authorship of the photograph
restrictions.item7: Use in a trademark or logo

releases.title: 5. Model and Property Releases
releases.p1: Photos featuring identifiable people or private property may require additional releases for certain uses. Release information is displayed on each photo's detail page.
releases.item1: Model Released: Commercial use with identifiable people permitted
releases.item2: Property Released: Commercial use with identifiable property permitted
releases.item3: Editorial Only: Use limited to newsworthy/editorial context

attribution.title: 6. Attribution
attribution.p1: Attribution is appreciated but not required under either license type. If you choose to provide credit, please use: "Photo by [Photographer Name] via NABD".

authenticity.title: 7. Authenticity Guarantee
authenticity.p1: All photos on NABD are verified as authentic human-made photography. Each image includes preserved EXIF metadata demonstrating its authenticity. If you discover a photo was misrepresented, contact us for a full refund.

warranty.title: 8. Warranty and Indemnification
warranty.p1: NABD and the photographer warrant that:
warranty.item1: The photographer owns or has rights to license the image
warranty.item2: The image does not infringe any third-party rights (to our knowledge)
warranty.item3: Appropriate releases are obtained where indicated
warranty.p2: NABD's liability is limited to the purchase price of the license. We recommend consulting legal counsel for high-risk uses.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.p1: This license is perpetual unless terminated for breach. If you violate these terms, your license automatically terminates and you must cease all use of the image. NABD may pursue legal remedies for unauthorized use.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.p1: For licensing questions or custom licensing arrangements, contact:

buyCredits.purchaseDisabled: Credit purchase is currently disabled for your account.
buyCredits.contactSupportDesc: Please contact our support team to purchase credits.
buyCredits.securePayment: Your payment is secured with industry-standard encryption.
buyCredits.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your payment...
buyCredits.bankVerification: This verification is required by your bank for security.
